name: Ballistic Bounce
description:
The ball is rolling, race to the finish line as u face some obstacles standing in your way and stopping u from reaching the end find a way to stop those obstacles.

The game controls are simple
a ball will infinitely roll down and u have to click on the yellow cubes to avoid hitting the red cube, because if u hit the red cube u die 

This game was made by me as a solo dev 

                  Install instruction

1- Un-zip the file 

2- Open "Rolling Ball 2.exe"

3- Enjoy

Planned features :
1.More levels
2. build ur own maps and levels 



Rolling ball game released on: Saturday  January  2023
